comments:
With the last couple of eclipse releases, this has been happening.  After upgrading, I cannot connect to previously defined JIRA repository or create a new one.  I also have the latest webtools installed.

eclipse.buildId=I20060419-1640
java.version=1.5.0_04
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86 -clean

We should get this resolved by Friday.  For the time being, the work-around is listed at the top of bug 138144: remove the WTP axis plug-in since there is a conflict.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 138144 ***
